name: active-class
description: The active-class applied to children when they are activated.

name: color
description: Applies specified color to the control - it can be the name of material color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). You can find list of built in classes on the colors page.

name: dark
description: Applies the dark theme variant to the component. You can find more information on the Material Design documentation for dark themes.

name: light
description: Applies the light theme variant to the component.

name: mandatory
description: Forces a value to always be selected (if available).

name: max
description: Sets a maximum number of selections that can be made.

name: multiple
description: Allow multiple selections. The value prop must be an array.

name: rounded
description: Applies a large border radius on the buttons.

name: value
description: The designated model value for the component.
